:mod:`rawls.utils`
==================

.. py:module:: rawls.utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Utils function for .rawls file




---------------


.. function:: check_file_paths(filepaths)

   check filepaths input extension

   :param filepaths: {[str]} -- image filepaths list

   :raises Exception: Need at least two .rawls image filepaths
   :raises Exception: Invalid input filepaths extension
